typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		NAME as string,
		SAL as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		PKEY as integer,
		NAME as string,
		ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 lookup(source1@ID == source2@ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isMatch(),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(MATCH, NON-MATCH)
ConditionalSplit@NON-MATCH keyGenerate(output(newhjgf as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
SurrogateKey sink(input(
		PKEY as integer,
		NAME as string,
		ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		PKEY,
		NAME = ConditionalSplit@NON-MATCH@NAME,
		ID = ConditionalSplit@NON-MATCH@ID
	)) ~> sink1
